channel.title: Warnings
channel.description:
well i was just about to reply to a warning system complaint in the gereral section but then it hit me *no not a frizby* why not have diffrent warning for diffrent rules
[IMG]http://img115.imageshack.us/img115/5038/warnwarnjo0.gif[/img] for swearing
[IMG]http://img251.imageshack.us/img251/4561/warnwarn3ry2.gif[/img] for spamming
[IMG]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/3806/warnwarn2py9.gif[/img] for posting not approved sites
[IMG]http://img455.imageshack.us/img455/5539/warnwarn4nd8.gif[/img] for breaking the rules more than twice
[IMG]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/9861/warnwarn5be8.gif[/img] last warning
this is just and idea because i would think people would like to know what rule they broke and it would be easyer to see what rule other people broke.

item.title: Warnings
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

I do that alot

Read full topic

item.title: Warnings
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“devull, post:9, topic:68110”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=99670.msg1017556#msg1017556 date=1174020266]

well i was just about to reply to a warning system complaint in the gereral section but then it hit me no not a frizby
why not have diffrent warning for diffrent rules

for swearing

for spamming

for posting not approved sites

for breaking the rules more than twice

last warning

this is just and idea because i would think people would like to know what rule they broke and it would be easyer to see what rule other people broke.

No, just follow the rules, and mind your own business.
[/quote]
i do but like i wounder what people got warned for[/quote]

If you view people’s last posts, it’ll show the warning icon in the bottom of the post they were warned form.

Read full topic

item.title: Warnings
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:4, topic:68110”][quote author=therealjdb link=topic=99670.msg1017242#msg1017242 date=1174015517]

A warning is for breaking the rules, moderated posts is for breaking the rules while you have a warning, mute is for breaking the rules while you have moderated posts, banned for breaking rules on mute, IP bans for bypassing your ban, and a host or mac address bans in severe cases.

Not to mention I don’t think mopar CBA to modify the visual warning modifcation.
[/quote]

It’s not just modifying, it requires a whole recoding and a few modifications.[/quote]
Well I haven’t really looked at the code for it so I suppose you’re right. But you get my point.

Read full topic
